home.title: Welcome to Consee
home.subtitle: Configuration Management System

loggedIn.title: Already Logged In
loggedIn.description: You are currently logged in with the following token:
loggedIn.switchPrompt: Enter a new token below to switch users

accessRequired.title: Access Required
accessRequired.description: Please enter your ACL token to continue

home.tokenError: Token should be a valid UUID

header.notificationError: Failed to get notification status, please refresh the page and try again

keyValue.title: Key List
keyValue.selectPrompt: Select a key from key list to view details
keyValue.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh key list: {message}. Try reloading the page.

tokenPage.title: Token List
tokenPage.selectPrompt: Select a token from the list to view details
tokenPage.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh token list: {message}. Try reloading the page.

policyPage.title: Policy List
policyPage.selectPrompt: Select a policy from the list to view details
policyPage.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh policy list: {message}. Try reloading the page.

rolePage.title: Role List
rolePage.selectPrompt: Select a role from the list to view details
rolePage.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh role list: {message}. Try reloading the page.

export.title: Export
export.aclLabel: Export all ACL resources, including tokens, policies and roles
export.jsonPrompt: Exported JSON file is compatible with Consul's KV API. You can use 'consul kv import' to import the file to Consul. This format does not support exporting history versions.
